icad-lisp.loadlisp.title: Load lisp
icad-lisp.loadlisp.attach: First, attach to or launch a host application before loading this file.
icad-lisp.loadlisp.fileformat.win: This file format isn’t supported. Activate a window containing a DCL, LSP, or MNL file.
icad-lisp.loadlisp.fileformat.mac: This file format isn’t supported. Activate a window containing a DCL or LSP file.
